ctl:test.name: wcs2:req17
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req17:Send a valid DescribeCoverage request and check that the result is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req18
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req18:Send DescribeCoverage requests with valid and invalid request structure. Pass test if appropriate valid results or exceptions, resp., are delivered.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req19
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req19:Each coverage identifier in the list submitted in a DescribeCoverage request shall identify a wcs:OfferedCoverage object available on the server addressed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req20
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req20:For all coverages offered by the server under test, send a DescribeCoverage request to server under test, check the result con?sists of an XML document of type CoverageDescriptions as describ?ed in the references stated by the requirement. Test passes if all individual tests pass.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req21
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req21:The response to a successful DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req22
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req22:Obtain the list of coverage identifiers by sending a valid GetCapabilities request to the server under test. Send DescribeCoverage requests with a (non-empty) subset of the list and with the complete identifier list. Check responses whether they fulfill the requirement for each coverage description returned.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req23
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req23:If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req23:If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req17
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req17:Send a valid PostXML DescribeCoverage request and check that the result is not an exception.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req17
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req17:Send a valid GetKVP DescribeCoverage request and check that the result is not an exception.

xsl:choose.xsl:otherwise:
[FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport.
...

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req17
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req17:Send a valid SOAP DescribeCoverage request and check that the result is not an exception.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req18
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req18:Send PostXML DescribeCoverage requests with valid and invalid request structure. Pass test if appropriate valid results or exceptions, resp., are delivered.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request structure is valid.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request structure is invalid.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req18
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req18:Send GetKVP DescribeCoverage requests with valid and invalid request structure. Pass test if appropriate valid results or exceptions, resp., are delivered.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request structure is valid.

xsl:choose.xsl:otherwise:
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request structure is invalid.
...

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req18
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req18:Send SOAP DescribeCoverage requests with valid and invalid request structure. Pass test if appropriate valid results or exceptions, resp., are delivered.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request structure is valid.
[FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request structure is valid.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req19
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req19:Each coverage identifier in the list submitted in a DescribeCoverage Post XML request shall identify a wcs:OfferedCoverage object available on the server addressed.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies valid wcs:OfferedCoverage objects.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies an invalid wcs:OfferedCoverage object.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies an invalid wcs:OfferedCoverage object.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req19
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req19:Each coverage identifier in the list submitted in a GetKVP DescribeCoverage request shall identify a wcs:OfferedCoverage object available on the server addressed.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies valid wcs:OfferedCoverage objects.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies an invalid wcs:OfferedCoverage object.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies an invalid wcs:OfferedCoverage object.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req19
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req19:Each coverage identifier in the list submitted in a SOAP DescribeCoverage request shall identify a wcs:OfferedCoverage object available on the server addressed.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies valid wcs:OfferedCoverage objects.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies an invalid wcs:OfferedCoverage object.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies an invalid wcs:OfferedCoverage object.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req20
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req20:For all coverages offered by the server under test, send a PostXML DescribeCoverage request to server under test, check the result consists of an XML document of type CoverageDescriptions as described in the references stated by the requirement. Test passes if all individual tests pass.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies valid wcs:OfferedCoverage objects.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req20
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req20:For all coverages offered by the server under test, send a GetKVP DescribeCoverage request to server under test, check the result consists of an XML document of type CoverageDescriptions as described in the references stated by the requirement. Test passes if all individual tests pass.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies valid wcs:OfferedCoverage objects.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req20
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req20:For all coverages offered by the server under test, send a SOAP DescribeCoverage request to server under test, check the result consists of an XML document of type CoverageDescriptions as described in the references stated by the requirement. Test passes if all individual tests pass.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport when the request identifies valid wcs:OfferedCoverage objects.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req21
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req21:The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.
[FAILURE] The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req21
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req21:The response to a successful GetKVP DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.
[FAILURE] The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req21
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req21:The response to a successful SOAP DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.
[FAILURE] The response to a successful PostXML DescribeCoverage request with n>0 coverage identifiers shall be a list containing n items.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req22
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req22:Obtain the list of coverage identifiers by sending a valid GetCapabilities request to the server under test. Send PostXML DescribeCoverage requests with a (non-empty) subset of the list and with the complete identifier list. Check responses whether they fulfill the requirement for each coverage description returned.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The CoverageId should identify the correct coverage.
[FAILURE] The identifiers should identify correct coverages.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req22
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req22:Obtain the list of coverage identifiers by sending a valid GetCapabilities request to the server under test. Send GetKVP DescribeCoverage requests with a (non-empty) subset of the list and with the complete identifier list. Check responses whether they fulfill the requirement for each coverage description returned.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The CoverageId should identify the correct coverage.
[FAILURE] The identifiers should identify correct coverages.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req22
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req22:Obtain the list of coverage identifiers by sending a valid GetCapabilities request to the server under test. Send SOAP DescribeCoverage requests with a (non-empty) subset of the list and with the complete identifier list. Check responses whether they fulfill the requirement for each coverage description returned.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The CoverageId should identify the correct coverage.
[FAILURE] The identifiers should identify correct coverages.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req23
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req23:If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req23
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req23:If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req23
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req23:If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] If a geometric or temporal object in the domainSet of a coverageDescription specifies an srsName attribute, the value of this attribute shall be identical to the srsName attribute of the boundedBy element of the containing coverageDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req24:When a WCS server encounters an error while performing a PostXML DescribeCoverage operation it shall return an exception report message chosen as specified in req 23.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req24:When a WCS server encounters an error while performing a GetKVP DescribeCoverage operation it shall return an exception report message chosen as specified in req 23.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req24:When a WCS server encounters an error while performing a SOAP DescribeCoverage operation it shall return an exception report message chosen as specified in req 23.
